Text.val: 31.07.2014 AS: SCR#19002 Loop deductions was missing a filter criteria
27.08.2014 AS SCR#19068 Removed references to CV1

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DCMC_MARK_CODE, count(*) from flprod/DCMC inner join flprod/cflc on DCMC_ADMNO=CFLC_ADMNOALLOWED and DCMC_CLNTNO=CFLC_CLNTNOALLOWED inner join flprod/debc on DCMC_DEBC_NO=DEBC_NO WHERE CFLC_ADMNO=:1 and CFLC_CLNTNO=:2 AND CFLC_USRID=':4' AND DEBC_DATDELETED IS NULL AND (DCMC_SPECIALACCOUNTC-DCMC_EXTRAFINANCEC+DCMC_DISPUTESGROSSC)<>0 :3 GROUP BY DCMC_MARK_CODE ORDER BY DCMC_MARK_CODE

ExpSyntax.val: IF ({1,16}='Y', '', 'AND CFLC_ADMNOALLOWED=' & Trim(Str({1,9},'')) & ' and CFLC_CLNTNOALLOWED=' & Trim(Str({1,10},'')))

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DCMC_ADMNO, DCMC_CLNTNO, DCMC_MARK_CODE, DCMC_DEBC_NO, DCMC_DEBH_NO, DCMC_SPECIALACCOUNTH, DCMC_EXTRAFINANCEH, DCMC_SPECIALACCOUNTC, DCMC_EXTRAFINANCEC, DCMC_DISPUTESGROSSC from flprod/DCMC inner join flprod/cflc on DCMC_ADMNO=CFLC_ADMNOALLOWED and DCMC_CLNTNO=CFLC_CLNTNOALLOWED where CFLC_ADMNO=:1 and CFLC_CLNTNO=:2 and CFLC_USRID=':5' :3 :4 AND (DCMC_SPECIALACCOUNTC-DCMC_EXTRAFINANCEC+DCMC_DISPUTESGROSSC)<>0

ExpSyntax.val: IF ({1,16}='Y', '', 'AND CFLC_ADMNOALLOWED=' & Trim(Str({1,9},'')) & ' and CFLC_CLNTNOALLOWED=' & Trim(Str({1,10},'')))
